00049         private void applyButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)
00050         {
00051             String stockItemsFilePath = stockItemsFilePathTextBox.Text;
00052             String bankAccountsFilePath = bankAccountFilePathTextBox.Text;
00053             this.SaveApplicationSettings(stockItemsFilePath, bankAccountsFilePath);

00056 
00057         private void SaveApplicationSettings(string stockItemsFilePath, string bankAccountsFilePath)
00058         {
00059             Settings settings = Settings.Default;
00060             settings.StockItemFilePath = stockItemsFilePath;
00061             settings.BankAccountFilePath = bankAccountsFilePath;
00062             settings.Save();
00063         }
